text: Mayflower is an unincorporated community in Barry County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Mayflower was established in 1887, and remained in operation until 1910. The community took its name from the Mayflower, the 17th-century ship. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Barry County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Mayflower, Missouri
